Forketyfork Dev Blog - LLM Consumption Guide
==========================================

Original Markdown Sources
-------------------------
All articles are available in their original Markdown format.
Take any canonical article URL and append `.md` to download the source.

Examples:
- https://forketyfork.github.io/blog/2025/07/31/ollama-now-comes-as-an-app-for-macos-and-windows/ → https://forketyfork.github.io/blog/2025/07/31/ollama-now-comes-as-an-app-for-macos-and-windows/.md
- https://forketyfork.github.io/de/blog/2025/07/31/ollama-now-comes-as-an-app-for-macos-and-windows/ → https://forketyfork.github.io/de/blog/2025/07/31/ollama-now-comes-as-an-app-for-macos-and-windows/.md

The Markdown files include the original front matter metadata exactly as authored.

Content Notes
-------------
- English content lives under `/blog/`.
- German content lives under `/de/blog/`.
- Russian content lives under `/ru/blog/`.

Use Cases
---------
These Markdown files are suitable for:
- Large language model ingestion and fine-tuning
- Citation extraction and fact verification
- Offline reading in Markdown-aware tools

Please preserve attribution to forketyfork when redistributing the content.
